author: jstrachan
msg: Removed dependency on Xalan 1. The xtags:xalanStyle tag has been removed, the xtags:style tag which uses JAXP should be used instead. For users who wish to use the non-JAXP Xalan 1 compatible xtags:xalanStyle then please do a checkout with the non-JAXP-support tag.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag

author: jstrachan
msg: Added new sorting option for the xtags:forEach tag which allows sorting to be in either ascending or descending order

author: jstrachan
msg: Added patch to bug found by Tobias Himstedt that the <xtags:style> tag could not accept variables of type Object. Added Tobias' test case to examples/web/test/xslt which demonstrate it now working.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added patch to bug found by Tobias Himstedt that the <xtags:style> tag could not accept variables of type Object. Added Tobias' test case to examples/web/test/xslt which demonstrate it now working.
